column2: Canonical
Sandbox
Elven Warfare
The firstborn cannot make war amongst themselves except to fight liberation wars or pursue rivals, kinslayers, and servants of the enemy.
The firstborn can make war amongst themselves freely.
The Coming of Men
The Forodwaith will arrive about 100 years after the return of the Noldor, while the Edain and Easterlings arrive around 200 years after that.
The Forodwaith, Edain, and Easterlings may arrive at any time.
The race of Men never come to Beleriand.
The War of Wrath
The War of Wrath will occur when the world is nearly overrun by Morgoth and a fated Mariner ventures west.
The War of Wrath may occur at the whims of the Valar, or if they are persuaded by a bold Mariner.
The Valar will not intervene on behalf of anybody, and Middle-Earth will be left to its own fate.
The Evil Breath
The Evil Breath will come after the Bragollach to blight the race of Men.
The Evil Breath will come sometime after the arrival of Men.
The Evil Breath will never come from the North.
Great Battles
Great Battles of Beleriand will occur roughly when they did in the Silmarillion.
Great Battles of Beleriand will occur randomly, not tied to particular ones from the Silmarillion.
